Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its advanced features and high-quality materials, it's truly a game-changer in its category. I believe it could significantly enhance your daily life or work efficiency. Considering its exceptional value and benefits, I am offering it to you for $200. I'm confident you'll find this investment worthwhile. Let me know if you have any questions or need more information about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
